Name: Mothership Core
Description:
Mobile flying caster. Can use Photon Overcharge, Mass Recall, and Time Warp abilities. Can upgrade into the Mothership.

Can attack ground units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Move Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Move Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Energizes the target Nexus's khaydarin crystal, turning it into a powerful long-range weapon for 20 seconds that deals 30 damage.
Root.Name: Photon Overcharge

Root.Tooltip: Teleports the Mothership Core and all nearby units owned by the player to the targeted Nexus.
Root.Name: Mass Recall

Root.Tooltip: Cancels the upgrade order, returning the structure to its original state.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Upgrades into the Mothership. Can use Photon Overcharge, Mass Recall, and Time Warp abilities. Cloaks nearby units and structures.
Root.Name: Upgrade to Mothership

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Warps spacetime within the target area for 10 seconds. Enemy ground units that enter the field have their movement speed reduced by 50%.
Root.Name: Time Warp

Root.Tooltip: Creates Mineral Shields over Mineral Fields within the target area. Shields prevent minerals from being harvested for 60 seconds or until destroyed.
Root.Name: Entomb
